{
    "request": {
        "type": "content",
        "subtype": "courses",
        "action": "filter",
        "component": "*",
        "framework": "*",
        "data": {
            "templateName": "defaultTemplate",
            "action": "filter",
            "fields": [
                {
                    "code": "topic",
                    "dataType": "text",
                    "name": "Topics",
                    "label": "Topics",
                    "description": "Topics covered in the courses",
                    "editable": true,
                    "inputType": "topic-picker",
                    "required": false,
                    "displayProperty": "Editable",
                    "visible": true,
                    "renderingHints": {
                        "semanticColumnWidth": "four"
                    },
                    "index": 1
                },
                {
                    "code": "purpose",
                    "dataType": "text",
                    "name": "Purpose",
                    "label": "Purpose",
                    "description": "Purpose of the course",
                    "editable": true,
                    "inputType": "multi-select",
                    "required": false,
                    "displayProperty": "Editable",
                    "visible": true,
                    "renderingHints": {
                        "semanticColumnWidth": "four"
                    },
                    "index": 2
                },
                {
                    "code": "medium",
                    "dataType": "text",
                    "name": "Medium",
                    "label": "Medium",
                    "description": "Medium of Instruction",
                    "editable": true,
                    "inputType": "multi-select",
                    "required": false,
                    "displayProperty": "Editable",
                    "visible": true,
                    "renderingHints": {
                        "semanticColumnWidth": "four"
                    },
                    "index": 3
                },
                {
                    "code": "gradeLevel",
                    "dataType": "text",
                    "name": "Class",
                    "label": "Class",
                    "description": "Classes taught",
                    "editable": true,
                    "inputType": "multi-select",
                    "required": false,
                    "displayProperty": "Editable",
                    "visible": true,
                    "renderingHints": {
                        "semanticColumnWidth": "four"
                    },
                    "index": 4
                },
                {
                    "code": "subject",
                    "dataType": "text",
                    "name": "Subject",
                    "label": "Subject",
                    "description": "Subject of the Content to use to teach",
                    "editable": true,
                    "inputType": "multi-select",
                    "required": false,
                    "displayProperty": "Editable",
                    "visible": true,
                    "renderingHints": {
                        "semanticColumnWidth": "four"
                    },
                    "index": 5
                },
                {
                    "code": "channel",
                    "dataType": "text",
                    "name": "Organization",
                    "label": "Organization",
                    "description": "Organization of courses",
                    "editable": true,
                    "inputType": "multi-select",
                    "required": false,
                    "displayProperty": "Editable",
                    "visible": true,
                    "renderingHints": {
                        "semanticColumnWidth": "four"
                    },
                    "index": 6
                }
            ]
        },
        "rootOrgId": "*"
    }
}

                        {

                        {

                        }

                    "inputType": "licenses",

                    "placeholder": "license",
